summary: This is a combined .esp for all my shoes. It requires all my other shoe mods to work. It's only function is to allow you to use a single plugin instead of a growing list of plugins.
descriptionHtml:
This is an all-in-one  .esp for all my shoe mods. I will update it each time I add some more shoes. [b]This is ONLY a replacement .esp. On it's own it will NOT work[/b]. It is intended as a convenience item or for those who are approaching the plugin limit. To use you must first install all of my shoes.

Ankle Boots ﻿ ﻿  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89480]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89480[/url]
Pumps ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89613]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89613[/url]
Myrtles [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89744] ﻿https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89744[/url]
Jennes ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89922]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89922[/url]
BabyDoll [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90038]       https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90038
[/url]Cuenca                         [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90378]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90378[/url]

You can then install this mod and deactivate the other plugins. You must keep the texture and mesh folders from the above mods intact, or you won't have any shoes.

When I have made enough shoes, I will make a shoe shop mod. This mod will be a completely self-contained collection of all my shoes. Please don't ask me to combine them all into one mod now. I am still making more shoes.  It will make me sad.

There is an alternative .esp for users of the Heel Sound mod from Loverslab. If you do not have Heel Sound installed (https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1795-heels-sound/ ) do not use this file. It will crash your game.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/XysvLEd.jpg[/img]
author: Frank
